title: Public utility and amenity shall not be developed under AR as per Regulation No
clause_text: Public utility and amenity shall not be developed under AR as per Regulation No.17. The entire plot of amenity shall be developed entirely for the purpose of public amenity/POS as per sub regulation No 14(B)(c) ii above of this regulation.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone

source_pdf.text_snippet: Public utility and amenity shall not be developed under AR as per Regulation No.17. The entire plot of amenity shall be developed entirely for the purpose of public amenity/POS as per sub regulation N
